amendment.description: To repeal the therapy cap and provide for medical review of outpatient therapy services.

action.text: Amendment SA 1119 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 1119 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 42. Record Vote Number: 142.
Point of order that the amendment violates the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1119.
Amendment SA 1119 proposed by Senator Cardin. (consideration: CR S2160) To repeal the therapy cap and provide for medical review of outpatient therapy services.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1119 proposed by Senator Cardin.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 1119 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 58 - 42. Record Vote Number: 142.
